Town Council
============

Meetings
========

* 7:00 PM![Texas Flag](https://www.shady-shores.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=692)
* Second Monday of each month  
  (*First Monday on Meeting dates prior to**December 8, 2014)*
* Town Hall  
  101 S. Shady Shores Road  
  Shady Shores, TX 76208
* [Current Town Council](https://www.shady-shores.com/955)

Agendas & Minutes and View LiveStream or Recorded Meetings
==========================================================

Agendas are made available no later than 72 hours prior to a meeting.

If available, packets are made available at the same time as the Agenda.

For more information [View all agendas, minutes](https://www.shady-shores.com/990/Agendas-and-Minutes) and LiveStream.

### Archived Agendas & Minutes

* [View archived agendas](https://www.shady-shores.com/Archive.aspx?AMID=60 "View All City Council Agendas")
* [View archived minutes](https://www.shady-shores.com/Archive.aspx?AMID=61 "View All City Council Minutes")

Agendas, Minutes, or Videos not found here may be requested by a [Public Records Request](https://www.shady-shores.com/FormCenter/Building-Permit-7/Request-for-Public-Records-45). You will be asked to create a login to access the request form.

**Request an item on the agenda**. [FORM](https://www.shady-shores.com/Archive.aspx?ADID=226)

Description
-----------

The Town of Shady Shores is governed by a Mayor and City Council who are elected by the people of the Town. The Mayor and City Council acting together are the Governing Body. All Governing Body members serve two-year terms. The Governing Body, being the elected representative of the people, adopts all ordinances and resolutions and determines the general goals and policies.
